title: I am a Rengar player
body: Dear Riot, dont nerf  {{champion:107}} purely for the reason of more clearly defining the meta. There are certain champions right now in the jungle that are clearly many times better than other choices in viability (clear speed especially). Also, dont nerf him because i just enjoy playing him. We all know the counterplay to {{champion:107}}  is  to stay grouped, then hes marginally effective. The nerfs will make it much much harder to compete with a more viable jungler.

replies.body: I'm sorry you won't be able to jump on people and explode them before they can react anymore.

ur right, 5 top so i dont get ulted by rengar. gotta stay grouped at 10 minutes :)))))) this champ can get gutted for all i care, and i really wanted to learn rengar. hes disgustingly stupid. getting cced before a champion even fucking appears on the map is broken as he melts u .

I agree, when I found out one of my favorite junglers was being nerfed so hard out of nowhere, it made me want to cry inside. I really never thought of rengar as op at all, there are certainly other champions they should be looking at to nerf other than rengar (hey there Illaoi, how's your tentacle nest doin?).
indeed im a renagr main and the peopel who cry dont ever play as him lol. he has a ult that has a cd os i dotn see why peopel are compl
